inclusion.criterion: complain of localized provoked vulvar pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: meet the criteria for the diagnosis of localized provoked vulvodynia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: have failed or have been unable to tolerate previous attempts at systematic therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: dermatologic or neurologic condition as primary cause of pain
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: allergy to medications or base itself
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: concurrent use of Tramadol (UltramTM, ConZipTM, RybixTM, RysoltTM, Ultram ERTM)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of alcohol consumption. She has leukocytosis, urea elevation, high CRP, and amylase levels. Her abdominal CT scan shows acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis.
